text: Ricardo Guasch (born 10 November 1933) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1979 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Ricardo Guasch
